resources.string: Shannon Modem Tweaks
Shannon Tweaks
If you\'re not using a Pixel device, you shouldn\'t attempt to use this app. It could damage your device.
Your device appears to be reporting as a %1$s, but other factors make us unsure.
We think you\'re rocking a %1$s.
You\'re not using a Pixel device (or you\'re using an unknown model).
If you\'re sure it is, please report this as a bug.
This doesn\'t seem like a Google Pixel device.
Super! We\'ve confirmed root access on your device.
Uh oh! We couldn\'t confirm root access on your device, or you denied the superuser confirmation dialog.
To modify modem features, we need root access to your device.
Check for root access
Info
Tweaks
Run a tweak to see its output here.\n\n
We can\'t be certain that your device is a Google Pixel with a Shannon modem.
These tweaks and settings will only work on a Google Pixel with a Shannon modem.
Until we can determine your device is compatible, you cannot apply any tweaks.
Looks like Network Signal Guru is currently running. You\'ll need to close it before applying tweaks.
Check again
Having issues after applying tweaks?
Resetting nvitems will remove any tweaks you have applied. You won\'t lose any eSIMs, network or software settings.
Reset nvitems
Reset
Cancel
Reset nvitems
Are you sure you want to reset your nvitems to defaults?
Your device will automatically reboot during this process.
Resetting nvitems
This might take a few minutes
Your device will automatically reboot during this process
OK
Error
We failed to reset your modem\'s nvitems.
You don\'t have root access or haven\'t allowed it for this app.
An execution error occurred while attempting to rename your nvitems database.
